resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156814</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156814</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring a Foreign Country</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen eines Auslands</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorer un pays étranger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorando um país extrangeiro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione del paese straniero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερεύνηση μιας ξένης χώρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorar un país extranjero</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Exploring a foreign country in terms of people, cultures, geography and history. learners produce a written assignment and an oral presentation, then prepare a travel brochure of the specific country.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foreign country</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">people</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cultures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Ausland in Leuten ausgedrückt erforschend, 
produzieren Kultur-, Geographie- und Geschichtenanfänger eine 
schriftliche Anweisung und eine Munddarstellung, bereiten dann eine 
Spielraumbroschüre des spezifischen Landes vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorant un pays étranger en termes de 
personnes, les étudiants de cultures, de géographie et d'histoire 
produisent une affectation écrite et une présentation orale, 
préparent alors une brochure de voyage du pays spécifique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorando um país extrangeiro nos termos dos 
povos, os learners das culturas, da geografia e do history. produzem 
uma atribuição escrita e uma apresentação oral, prepara então um 
folheto do curso do país específico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorando un paese straniero in termini di gente,
i principianti delle colture, di geografia e di storia producono 
un'assegnazione scritta e una presentazione orale, allora prepara un 
opuscolo di corsa del paese specifico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνώντας μια ξένη χώρα από την άποψη των 
ανθρώπων, οι αρχάριοι πολιτισμών, γεωγραφίας και ιστορίας 
παράγουν μια γραπτή ανάθεση και μια προφορική παρουσίαση, 
κατόπιν προετοιμάζουν ένα φυλλάδιο ταξιδιού της συγκεκριμένης 
χώρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorando un país extranjero en términos de la 
gente, los principiantes de las culturas, de la geografía y de la 
historia producen una asignación escrita y una presentación oral, 
entonces prepara un folleto del recorrido del país específico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kulturen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays étranger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les gens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cultures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">país extrangeiro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">povos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">culturas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paese straniero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la gente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξένη χώρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άνθρωποι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολιτισμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">país extranjero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">culturas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
